lead_paragraph: LUFT--Richard Peter, M.D.,passed away peacefully on the morning of Saturday, April 9, 2016. He was a brilliant, passionate and dedicated general surgeon, serving Brooklyn throughout his decades-long career. Richard is survived by his wife, Marina Woods, son and daughter, Jared and Gaby, from his previous marriage to Millicent Luft, and granddaughters, Aubrey Joyce Luft, Isadora Luft Bergamini, and Juliana Luft Bergamini. Richard's hallmarks were his curiosity, wry humor, effortless intelligence, masterful precision, and a relentless thirst for knowledge that permeated his many personal and professional pursuits. He approached his passions, simple to complex, with surgical exactitude. These ranged from household repairs, to the physics of baseball, to the molecular elements of cooking, etc. In recent years, he became interested in computer science, taking multiple online courses and once making so many corrections to an existing text, the author listed him as a contributor. He was a loving husband, father and grandfather who took pride in even our smallest accomplishments. He will remain forever in our hearts and minds. Memorial services will be held from 6-9pm, Wednesday, April 13 at Nevsky Yablokoff Memorial Chapels, 1700 Coney Island Ave., Brooklyn. 1/3
